MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge, affecting properties in Lomond Road and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair to faulty electrical equipment, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:32pm on  Friday, 25 December 2020.
